# Processing Largier Lab Russian River Estuary Data

```{r include = FALSE}
require(reval)
require(rremat)
```

## Processing CTD transect data

This code reproduces `ctd.df` from the Matlab files in `extdata`.

```{r process-ctd}
ctdpath = system.file("extdata/ctd", package = "rremat")
ctd = evalmany(function(fpath) read_rrectd(fpath, quiet = TRUE)[[1]], 
  fpath = paste0(ctdpath, "/", dir(ctdpath)), collate = FALSE)
ctd.df = depth_from_elev(merge_rrectd(ctd))
```

## Processing water level pressure gauge data

This code reproduces `wll.df` from the Matlab files in `extdata`.

```{r process-wll}
wllpath = system.file("extdata/wll", package = "rremat")
wll = evalmany(function(fpath) read_rrewll(fpath, quiet = TRUE)[[1]], 
  fpath = paste0(wllpath, "/", dir(wllpath)), collate = FALSE) 
wll.df = merge_rrewll(wll)
```
